page.title: 12PRIMARY SCHOOL SPORTS DAY
page.content: Once a year in June the Primary school holds its sports day on the school playing field.All the children are organized into four teams named after birds of prey :_ Eagles <red>, Falcons <blue>, Hawks <yellow> and Owls <green>. They compete for the silver Pixie Day Sports Cup. Points are awarded for each event. There are individual races and team events. There are running races but not all the races are about how fast you can run because not everyone can run fast so most races are about being skilful. The day is made enjoyable because everyone tries to be a good sportsman, that means if you lose you do not make a fuss. At the end of the meeting the Cup is presented to the winning team.
